title: 2016 Predictions: Calibration Results
summary:
Key ideas:
- The author made predictions for various events in 2016
- Predictions covered world events, personal and community matters
- The author assigned probabilities to each of the predictions

Key learnings:
- The author's predictions had an overall accuracy of 77%
- The author was relatively underconfident in predictions with a 70% probability
- The author's predictions had a high accuracy for 95% and 99% probabilities

Key questions:
- What were the author's predictions for 2017?
- Did the author make any notable changes to their predicting strategy after evaluating the accuracy of their 2016 predictions?
- How do the author's predictions reflect their general outlook on world events and personal matters?
